#summary How to install php-tesseract
=How to install php-tesseract=

1. copy tesseract.php into your program directory<BR>
{{{
wget http://php-tesseract.googlecode.com/files/tesseract.php
}}}
==For Precise==
2. copy tesseract.so inot `php-config --extension-dir`
{{{
wget http://php-tesseract.googlecode.com/files/tesseract.so
cp tesseract.so `php-config --extension-dir`
}}}
